name: team-talk-pro
description: **TeamTalk Pro+** enables authenticated users to communicate through public and private group channels or direct one-to-one chats, exchange documents, forward and reply to messages, and receive live updates via WebSockets. The system comprises a React front end using CSS modules, a Node.js + Express back end with Socket.IO and raw SQL, and a MySQL database. JWT-based authentication with cookie persistence secures all interactions.
